summary: Firehand and his Apache friend Winnetou are determined to get justice for the murder of four young braves. They set off to track down the gang responsible for the horrendous act.

keywords: falling downhill|english|pregnancy|lovers reunited|out of wedlock child
title: Hombres desesperados
